description: List articles by category

until.description: The value of meta/page/minmaxPublishOn/min json object returned right in this endpoint to load next page Default: 0

size.description: The number of items per response (max 40) Default: 20
size.title: Size

number.description: Page index for paging purpose Default: 1

name: comments_get_contents
description: This endpoint is used to get many comment's content at once by comment ids.

id.description: The value of id returned in .../articles/list or .../articles/list-trending or .../articles/list-wall-street-breakfast endpoints Default: 4469484
id.title: Id

comment_ids.description: The value of id field returned in .../comments/v2/list endpoint. You may pass this parameter multiple times to get content of many comments at once. Ex : ...&comment_ids=90666350&comment_ids=90666780&... Default: 90666350
comment_ids.title: Comment Ids

sort.description: Order by newest : -top_parent_id | Order by oldest : leave empty
sort.title: Sort

name: comments_get_sub_comments
description: This endpoint is used to get sub or nested comments of another comment

id.description: The value of id returned in .../articles/list or .../articles/list-trending or .../articles/list-wall-street-breakfast endpoints Default: 90949998
id.title: Id

sort.description: Order by newest : -top_parent_id | Order by oldest : leave empty
sort.title: Sort

name: comments_list
description: List all comments relating to a post or article or news

id.description: The value of id returned in .../articles/list or .../articles/list-trending or .../articles/list-wall-street-breakfast endpoints Default: 4405526
id.title: Id

from_id.description: Leave empty to load the first page or get suitable value of the last comment id returned right in this endpoint with parentId being "null" to load the next page Default: 88004158
from_id.title: From Id

sort.description: Order by newest : -top_parent_id | Order by oldest : leave empty
sort.title: Sort

name: screeners_list
description: List all screeners (Top Rated Stocks, Top Quant Dividend Stocks, Top Yield Monsters, etc...)

description: List available filters to be used in .../screeners/get-results endpoint

description: Get more information of a screener

id.description: The value of id field returned in .../screeners/list endpoint
id.title: Id

name: screeners_get_results
description: Get results of symbols by applied filters relating to a screener

name: accounts_get_access_token
description: Get access token by using own account from SA. The token is used to pass via request header while calling other endpoints. *The API does not support login by Google, or Apple.

name: accounts_get_info
description: Get account information with access token
